Posts.Content: Hi dee. Ive been taking letrazol for breast cancer for  about 3 months and my side effects have well just kicked in.  Hot flushes. Even tho ive finished my menopause. Lol.. itchy eyes.. waking up numerous times in the night.  Acid reflux hearburn. Aching bones n muscles esp after sitting down. And the cough its so dry but doctor told me its just a side effect so dont worry ur not alone.. x
Posts.Title: Letrozole and cough
